title: ACCOUNTANCY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language not Literature in English and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Government,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics.

title: ARCHITECTURAL TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and  Physics and two others from the following:



Fine Art,

Technical Drawing,

Wood Work,

Metal Work,

Building Construction,

Geography,

Chemistry,

Biology,

Carpentry & Joinery/Furniture Making,

Electrical Installation and Maintenance,

Plumbing,

Electronics.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any one (1) of Chemistry, Geography and Technical Drawing.

title: BANKING & FINANCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) subjects from the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Business Methods,

Principles of Accounts,

Literature in English

Geography

Office Practice

Biology/Agricultural Science,

Chemistry,

Physics,

History/Government

Typewriting

Shorthand
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Geography, History, Government, Commerce or Principles of Accounts.

title: BUILDING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any three (3) of the following:

Economics/Commerce,

Technical Drawing/Fine Art,

Chemistry,

Geography,

Further Mathematics

Woodwork,

Biology,

Religious Knowledge,

Metal Work,

And at least a credit pass in English Language is Compulsory.  A pass in Art or Technical Drawing will be an advantage.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry or Fine Arts.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics/Commerce and any two () credit passes from the following:


Account/Book-Keeping/Financial Accounting/Cost Accounting,

Office Practice,

Government/Civic Education,

Geography,

Agric Science/Animal Husbandry/Fishery/Biology,

Information & Communication Technology/Computer Science,

Marketing,

Insurance,

Business Method
subjects: Mathematics and two (2) of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts and Economics

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering a pass in Biology is required.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, a basic science and three (3) other subjects chosen from the following:

Economics,

Geography,

Government/History,

Further Mathematics,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agricultural Science.

English Language,

Typewriting,

'O' Level credit passes in English Language and Physics is compulsory.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Geography, Physics, Economics or Chemistry.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry

title: ESTATE MANAGEMENT & VALUATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes in Mathematics, English Language, a basic science subject and any two (2) from the following:

Geography,

Economics/Commerce,

Physics,

Biology,

Chemistry,

Technical Drawing,

Fine Art,

Woodwork,

Literature,

Metal Work,

Principles of Accounts and Book Keeping

Government
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Economics, Arts, Physics, Chemistry, Biology

title: FOOD TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science and any two (2) of the following:

Physics, Technical Drawing,

Economics/Commerce,

English Language,

Additional/Further Mathematics,

Home Economics, Food and Nutrition,

Geography, Physics and English Language.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science and any two (2) of the following: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Economics

Economics/Commerce,

Office Practice

Government,

Economics,

Insurance,

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language and Mathematics and any three (3) other subjects from:

History,

Literature in English,

Economics/Commerce,

Fine Arts,

Government,

Biology

Physics,

Chemistry

Basic Electricity

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any one (1) subject from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork (for Civil Engineering Tech.),

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: OFFICE TECHNOLOGY & MANAGEMENT
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language (not Literature in English) and Mathematics and any three (3) of the following: Economics/Commerce, Business Methods, Principles of Accounts, Literature in English, Geography, Office Practice, Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Physics, History/Government, Typewriting, Shorthand
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) of: Mathematics, Economics/Commerce History/Government/Civic Education, CRS/IRS, Literature in English.

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and Physics are compulsory and any other two (2) subjects from the following:

Geography/Economics,

Chemistry,

Biology/Agric Science,

Technical Drawing,

Fine Arts,

Woodwork/Metal Work,
subjects:
English Language, Mathematics, and any two from the following:

Biology,

Agric Science,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce

Chemistry,

Technical Drawing,

Fine Art,

Wood/Metal Work

title: SCIENCE LABORATORY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and two (2) of Physics,

Biology/Agricultural Science/Health Science, Chemistry,

and two (2) other subjects from Technical Drawing, Metal or Wood Work, Basic Electricity, Geography, Further Mathematics, and Fine Arts.

'O' Level credit pass in each of the three (3) Basic Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Physics and a 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Biology/Agricultural Science or Physics

title: STATISTICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language and Mathematics are compulsory. Also credit passes in Biology or Chemistry or Physics or Agric Science or Health Science are compulsory. And  credit passes from any two (2) of the following:


 Geography,

Government/History,

Economics/Commerce,

Biology/Agric Science/Health Science

Chemistry,

Physics,

Civic Education,

Computer Science/ICT
subjects:
English Language, Mathematics and any of two (2) of:


Economics/ Commerce,

Geography,

History/Government,

Biology/Agric Science,

Chemistry,

Physics.

title: SURVEYING & GEO-INFORMATICS
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics and Physics and any other three (3) subjects from the following:

Further Mathematics,

Chemistry;

Technical Drawing/Fine Art,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce,

Biology/Agricultural Science,

English Language,

Basic Electricity

At least 'O' Level credit pass in English Language is compulsory.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry/Agricultural Science, Biology, Economics and Mathematics

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics are compulsory. And any other three subjects from the following:


Geography,

Biology,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Agric Science,

Economics,

Statistics/Further Mathematics,

Technical Drawing,

Fine Art,

Information and Communication Technology/Computer Science
subjects:
English Language, Mathematics and two (2) other subjects from the following:


Geography,

Physics,

Economics,

Biology,

Agric Science,

Technical Drawing or Fine Art
